Mandate: Broadcast news, community updates, and investigative reports encouraging accountability in revenue and public spending.
TopPriorities: Air segments on financial fraud to influence public sentiment.
Use call-in shows to capture local testimony on corrupt procurement.
Support whistleblower campaigns by providing safe on-air tips.
ActiveOperations: Citizen hotline documenting suspicious activities.
Weekly programs featuring interviews with analysts and experts.
Broadcasts explaining court rulings and legal processes in plain language.

RecentActions.Title: Live studio briefing with government officials
RecentActions.Summary: Allowed listeners to submit real-time questions about ongoing issues.

RecentActions.Summary: Partnered with civil society to verify facts before airing.

RecentActions.Summary: Partnered with civil society to verify facts before airing.

Mandate: Broadcast news, community updates, and investigative reports encouraging accountability in revenue and public spending.
TopPriorities: Air segments on financial fraud to influence public sentiment.
Use call-in shows to capture local testimony on corrupt procurement.
Support whistleblower campaigns by providing safe on-air tips.
ActiveOperations: Citizen hotline documenting suspicious activities.
Weekly programs featuring interviews with analysts and experts.
Broadcasts explaining court rulings and legal processes in plain language.
